name: Maze King
description:
[Features]
- Multiplayer mode: Enjoy this formation online with everybody in the world.
- Single player mode: you can advance by clearing each stages in order.
- Provide 1000 questions in various difficulties
- Easy to control for everybody
- Supports your ranking, accomplishment, and multiplay
- support all tablet devices
